meanings.sent1: The intercampus shuttle service makes it easy to travel between campuses.
meanings.sent2: The intercampus meetings allow students from different campuses to collaborate.
meanings.sent3: The intercampus rivalry in sports always leads to exciting matches.
meanings.sent4: The intercampus connections form a strong network of educational institutions.
meanings.sent5: The intercampus bridge symbolizes the unity between the two campuses.

meanings.definition: Relating to or involving multiple campuses.
meanings.sent1: The intercampus events bring together students from various campuses.
meanings.sent2: The intercampus programs offer diverse learning opportunities across campuses.
meanings.sent3: The intercampus study groups make studying more fun and interactive.
meanings.sent4: The intercampus communication system ensures seamless coordination between campuses.
meanings.sent5: The intercampus initiatives aim to enhance collaboration among different campuses.
